privacyPolicy.list: Personal information is information related to a visitor, or a combination of pieces of information that could reasonably allow him to be identified. Personal information may consist of full name, personal contact numbers, residential address, email address, gender or date of birth. While information such as date of birth in isolation may not be enough to uniquely identify the visitor, a combination of full name and date of birth may be sufficient to do so.
Sensitive personal data or information ('SPDI') shall include the following
Financial information such as bank account or credit card or debit card or other payment instrument details.
Physical, physiological and mental health condition

Any information that is freely available or accessible in public domain or furnished under any law for the time being in force or otherwise furnished voluntarily by a visitor shall not be regarded as sensitive personal information

Subject to your consent, all Personal Data (including but not limited to phone numbers and email addresses) provided to Reef may be used and retained by Reef and Reef may disclose and transfer (whether in UAE or abroad) the same to Reef's agents, contractors, any telecommunications operators, any third party service providers, any third party collection agencies, any credit reference agencies, any security agencies, any credit providers, banks, financial institutions, professional advisers, any other persons under a duty of confidentiality to Reef and any of Reef's actual or proposed assignees or transferees of Reef's rights with respect to Reef to use, disclosure, holding, processing, retaining or transferring such Personal Data for the purposes mentioned above.

FAQcontent.content: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged.
